SA20n1364:13: paratrātmasamānacittatāṃ labdhvā'dhimuktito vā sāṃketikacittotpādalābhe jñānato vā pāramārthikacittotpādalābhe |
SA20n1364:14: ātmato vā punaḥ paratra viśiṣṭatarāmiṣṭatāṃ labdhvā tenaiva ca kāraṇenātmanaḥ parārthe viśiṣṭasaṃjñino bodhisattvasya kaḥ svārthaḥ parārtho vā |
SA20n1364:17: paratra loko na tathātinirdayaḥ pravartate tāpanakarmaṇāripau |
SA20n1364:18: yathā parārthaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhatāpane kṛpātmakaḥ svātmani saṃpravartate ||3 ||
SA20n1364:19: yathā svātmanaḥ parārtho viśiṣyate tatsādhayati parārthamātmano'tyarthaṃ saṃtāpanāt |
SA20n1364:24: tathāgatajñānamanuttaraṃ padaṃ parārtha eṣa tryadhiko daśātmakaḥ ||5 ||
SA20n1364:25: trividhe sattvanikāye hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭagotrastheḥ trayodaśavidho bodhisattvasya parārthaḥ |
SA20n1364:35: saha tathāgatajñānenetyeṣa triṣu gotrastheṣu yathāyogaṃ trayodaśavidhaḥ parārtho bodhisattvasya |
SA20n1364:38: kṣamā ca dāntā ca sudūragā'kṣayā jinātmajānāṃ pratipattiruttamā ||6 ||
SA20n1364:39: yathā'sau parārthapatipattiḥ saṃpannā bhavati tathā saṃdarśayati |
SA20n1364:50: na hyadūragatayā pratipattyā kulodayādayaḥ pareṣāṃ kartuṃ śakyāḥ |
SA20n1364:54: mahābhaye kāmijanaḥ pravartate cale viparyāsasukhe bhavapriyaḥ |
SA20n1364:55: pratisvamādhipraśame śamapriyaḥ sadā tu sarvādhiga[śa]me kṛpātmakaḥ ||7 ||
SA20n1364:56: jano vimūḍhaḥ svasukhārthamudyataḥ sadā tadaprāpya paraiti duḥkhatām |
SA20n1364:57: sadā tu dhīro hi parārthamudyato dvayārthamādhāya paraiti nirvṛtim ||8 ||
SA20n1364:61: vimūḍho janaḥ sadā svasukhārthaṃ pratipannaḥ sukhaṃ nāpnoti duḥkhamevāpnoti |
SA20n1364:62: bodhisattvastu parārthaṃ pratipannaḥ svaparārthaṃ saṃpādya nirvṛtisukhaṃ prāpnotyayamasyāparaḥ pratipattiviśeṣaḥ |
SA20n1364:64: yathā yathā hyakṣavicitragocare pravartate cāragato jinātmajaḥ |
SA20n1364:66: yena yena prakāreṇa cakṣurādīndriyagocare vicitre bodhisattvaḥ pravartate |
SA20n1364:67: īryāpathavyāpāracāre vartamānastena tena prakāreṇa saṃbaddhasādṛśyavacanairhitārthaṃ sattveṣu tatsarvamabhisaṃskaroti |
SA20n1364:71: akāmakāreṇa hi viprapattayo jane bhavantīti kṛpāvivṛddhitaḥ ||10 ||
SA20n1364:72: sadā kleśairasvatantrīkṛtacetane jane na saṃdoṣamupaiti bodhisattvaḥ |
SA20n1364:80: abhibhavamāhātmyaṃ sakalaṃ bhavatrayaṃ gatiṃ ca pañcavidhāmabhibhūyagamanāt |
SA20n1364:82: rūpaṃ cetsubhūta[te] bhāvo 'bhaviṣyannābhāvo nedaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuralokamabhibhūya niryāsyatīti vistaraḥ |
